item.title: Choose from a variety of MICE packages available in Southeast Asia
item.description:
Three travel companies — Chōsen, The Slate, and Samujana — have designed productivity programs for businesses and workgroups. These programs offer a variety of environments to help teams achieve their best results. For adventure junkies Source: Chosen website. A view of Bali. Chōsen provides experiences tailored for teams that thrive on new adventures and challenges: Activities include cliff jumping, canyoning, surfing, and cooking classes. Accommodation is available at their estate in Bali and other locations, including New Zealand...

item.title: The Garden Lounge at Sukhumvit Park in Bangkok provides a versatile indoor-outdoor option for MICE events
item.description:
The Garden Lounge at Sukhumvit Park, Bangkok – Marriott Executive Apartments is a unique venue for gatherings in the Sukhumvit area. Combining indoor and outdoor elements, it offers a versatile space for 30 to 160 guests. High ceilings and comfortable furniture create a welcoming atmosphere. This lounge seamlessly blends several design concepts, creating a space that is both modern and traditional, as well as casual and elegant. Featuring lawn and garden views, the Lounge covers over 400 square meters and can host a variety of events from meetings to cocktail receptions...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-garden-lounge-at-sukhumvit-park-in-bangkok-provides-a-versatile-indoor-outdoor-option-for-mice-events/

item.title: Thailand is gaining traction as a top choice for hosting business events
item.description:
Source: TCEB. Thailand, with the Thailand Convention and Exhibition Bureau (TCEB) at the helm, is establishing itself as a prime location for business events. As the Thai government’s primary representative for this sector, TCEB plays a vital role in solidifying Thailand’s leading position in the Asian business events industry and Bangkok’s status as a top-tier destination for international business events. The Thai business events sector is projected to experience robust growth in 2015, anticipating over a million visitors and generating approximately US$3...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/thailand-is-gaining-traction-as-a-top-choice-for-hosting-business-events/
